job_tasks.phrase: Help high-value users to find and start their journey with HubSpot
job_tasks.justification: This describes building features that directly impact user acquisition and the user journey, a core software development responsibility aimed at business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Support Acquisition, Distribution and Affiliations initiatives, building APIs and tools that will help Signup, Integrations and Partnerships
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions building APIs and tools to support business initiatives like signup, integrations, and partnerships, which are traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Write and ship production code that has meaningful user and business impact
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement of core software engineering responsibility: creating and deploying production-ready code that delivers value to users and the business.

job_tasks.phrase: Envision, build and analyze new features and tools, each contributing to company growth and revenue
job_tasks.justification: Covers the full software development lifecycle (ideation, building, analysis) for features and tools that drive business growth and revenue.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
job_tasks.justification: Describes the collaborative environment and process within which software development tasks are executed.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the broad collaboration required to successfully deliver software projects that have company-wide impact.

job_tasks.phrase: Help HubSpot users meet their goals, via changes you've made
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the outcome of software development â€“ enabling users to achieve their objectives through implemented changes.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
job_tasks.justification: Involves implementing technical solutions (experiments) to gather data and drive product improvements, a common software engineering practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business
job_tasks.justification: This phrase relates to understanding the business context, which is an overarching professional skill rather than a core software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: work autonomously on the most complex projects and set technical direction
Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc

profile.rationale: The job description focuses exclusively on core software engineering tasks such as building APIs, tools, and features to support user acquisition and business growth. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or any specialized AI/ML tasks, aligning perfectly with the definition of a 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly outlining core software engineering responsibilities without any mention of AI/ML technologies or tasks, making the classification unambiguous.
